text: In appreciating this story, modern conceptions of governmental duties must be set aside. A modern government needs taxation not merely for defence and offence but for a very wide range of social services. A mediaeval oligarchy needed taxation in revenues of crown lands, the fees of feudalism and the fines of justice) and to provide enough cash to meet royal expenses, and especially the expenses of waging war.
